Replace.Text: [COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]Thank you.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]I accept your offer of friendship. And of course, you'll be invited to the next royal wedding.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DELEGATION_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]We received your delegation at the palace. Thank you. The gifts will be treasured.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]Oh, very well. You may proceed.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]I extend to you the royal hand in friendship. Will you accept it?

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_WAR_FROM_AI_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]Masquerading as friends was kind of fun, wasn't it? Unfortunately it's time to drop the pretense and get to the business at hand.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_WAR_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]You dare attack my sovereign realm? I don't believe even Nostradamus could have predicted this!
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DEFEAT_FROM_AI_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]I have lived long enough to know when I am defeated. Carry on.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DELEGATION_FROM_AI_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]I have sent you a trade delegation with all of the customary gifts : herbs, olives, various cheeses, and baguettes to eat them with, of course.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DENOUNCE_FROM_AI_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]I don't like the look of what you've been up to. What would your friends think of this information? (Denounces You).
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DENOUNCE_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]The glory and might of France will not be tarnished by such obvious lies.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]I am Catherine, the Queen Mother of France, and I welcome you to the realm. I do so look forward to learning all there is to know about you.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_NEAR_INITIATOR_POSITIVE_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]By all means. It will be a pleasure to see your growing city up close.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_NO_MANS_INFO_EXCHANGE_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]I am enamored with architecture. Tell me, does your capital have any triumphant arches, or large metal towers?

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_VISIT_RECIPIENT_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]You have not lived until you have had our delicacies of food and drink. And I can show you how to use a fork, if you wish.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_GREETING_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]A pleasure, as always.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_KUDO_EXIT_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]All of my lovers are positively murdering each other to get some of your goods. What fun!
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_ALLIANCE_FROM_AI_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]Would you like to form an alliance?
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_AI_ACCEPT_DEAL_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]I do not want to be remembered as a warmonger. Let us put aside our differences.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_AI_REFUSE_DEAL_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]Absolutely not.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_FROM_AI_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]I beg you for the sake of our loved ones, let there be peace between us.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MODIFIER_MAGNIFICENCES_NEGATIVE_TRADE]Catherine is upset that you are hoarding luxury resources she'd rather have herself.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MODIFIER_MAGNIFICENCES_POSITIVE_TRADE]Catherine is pleased you are trading luxury resources to her.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_AI_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]My military would like permission to pass through your lands. Peacefully, of course.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]How unfortunate!
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]I apologize, but this would be too sudden a change. Perhaps another time?
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DELEGATION_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]Tempting, but no.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]Unfortunately, I simply cannot allow it. For safety, of course.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_EXIT_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]How can my Flying Squadron critique your supposed luxuries if you don’t even send me any?
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_TOO_MANY_TROOPS_NEAR_ME_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_ANY]Do you think to intimidate us with force? That will not go well for you, at all.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_CHAPTER_CAPSULE_BODY]Magnificence Catherine augments her usual wonder and Château building program with lavish Court Festivals that quickly push France toward a Culture Victory, especially when she’s been able to hoard a vast collection of luxuries.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_CHAPTER_DETAILED_BODY]Magnificence Catherine is the one leader who wants to amass a large collection of luxury resources of all types and quantities. Having a sumptuous collection of opulent goods makes her Court Festivals the cultural events where all leaders want to see and be seen. With enough such festivals and a large collection of Châteaux and mid-game wonders, France should be the leading candidate for a Culture Victory whenever this benevolent version of Catherine appears. She’s just dangerous enough at this game that you might have to fight a war against the French Garde Impériale to keep her from rolling to a quick victory.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_ALT_QUOTE]There is a certain joy of life to our culture. It is useless to resist its charm.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_CATHERINE_DE_MEDICI_TITLE]Catherine de Medici (Black Queen)
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PROJECT_COURT_FESTIVAL_NAME]Court Festival
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PROJECT_COURT_FESTIVAL_SHORT_NAME]Court Festival

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PROJECT_ECOURT_FESTIVAL_DESCRIPTION]When complete, this project awards 50 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and 50 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism (on Standard speed) based on the number of excess copies of Luxury resources France possesses.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_TRAIT_AGENDA_MAGNIFICENCES_DESCRIPTION]Likes civilizations that trade Luxury resources to her. Dislikes civilizations that have not made such a trade. Tries to collect as many copies of Luxury resources as possible.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_TRAIT_AGENDA_MAGNIFICENCES_NAME]Sumptuous Finery
